photobiology

Convert spectral energy irradiance into spectral photon irradiance

For example an spectrum [W m-2 nm-1] is converted into a spectrum [s-1 m-2 nm-1]

as_quantum(w.length, s.e.irrad)

Arguments

w.length

numeric Vector of wavelengths (nm)
s.e.irrad

numeric Corresponding vector of spectral (energy) irradiances

Value

A numeric array of spectral photon irradiances

See also

Other quantity conversion functions: A2T, T2Afr, T2A, T2T, as_energy, as_quantum_mol, e2qmol_multipliers, e2quantum_multipliers, e2q, q2e

Examples

with(sun.data, as_quantum(w.length, s.e.irrad))
#>   [1] 3.849190e+12 9.090806e+12 3.231713e+13 1.010290e+14 2.292738e+14
